'(
wordrule
(
  (ruleid "BOC-:PNEUMONIA:-1-2018/11/15 23:01:13") 
  (specialized) 
  (example-snippet "Patchy by basilar pneumonia") 
  (ordered true) 
  (concept ":PNEUMONIA:") 
  (stype "<PULMONARY-DISEASE-THING>") 
  (bagofconcepts true) 
  (words 
    (":PATCHY::PNEUMONIA:")) 
  (tests 
    ("notneg" ?0)))

)
